summary: **The Prince of Egypt** is an animated movie from 1998. It tells the story of Moses, an Egyptian prince who becomes a prophet and leads the Hebrew people out of Egypt. The film is based on the Book of Exodus. It was made by DreamWorks and was their first traditionally animated film. The movie features songs and music by famous artists and won an Academy Award for the song "When You Believe." It was very popular and is considered one of the best animated films ever made.
title: The Prince of Egypt
